Malice:
 
The Hunter Killer parried one of her blades with the sword, and allowed the other to dig deep into the left side of his chest.  With his left hand, Malice reaches around and takes her by the waist and pulls her close, into his energy field.  He leaned down and put his face close to hers.
"Do you want to know what it's like?  To be able to heal, and regenerate?  The euphoria, the high of pain and regeneration?  Think you could handle it if you could experiance it?"
When he pulled Blacknightmare close, her blade was pushed in deeper, deepening his euphoric feeling.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare::

"As you Wish..."said the femme


She jumped back and took other of her feather missiles and attemp a 
double slah against Malice




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> Malice knocked to missiles away and charged forward with his own 
sword.  The swords clashed, and Malice grinned and leered at 
Blacknightmare.
> "Come on Master, show me what you got!"
> Malice poweed up again, throwing dust into the air from the sheer 
force he was giving off.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> The femme dodged, landed, jumped avoided as good as she could the 
> blast, altough she was hit by one she recoved quickly and fired 
two 
> feather missiles against  Malice. after that she took one of her 
> feather missiles and using as sword she attemped to hit Malice 
with 
> it
>

focused

<DIV>Malice:</DIV>

<DIV>"Do you want to know what it's like?  To be able to heal, and regenerate?  The euphoria, the high of pain and regeneration?  Think you could handle it if you could experiance it?"</DIV>
<DIV>When he pulled Blacknightmare close, her blade was pushed in deeper, deepening his euphoric feeling.<BR><BR><B><I>airly2000 <airly2002@...></I></B> wrote:</DIV>
